clusters.title: What is Mpox and why are cases rising in Europe?
clusters.neutral_headline: What is Mpox and why are cases rising in Europe

items.title: What is Mpox and why are cases rising in Europe?
items.standfirst: UK health officials are encouraging gay, bisexual and other men who have sex with men to be vaccinated.
items.content: UK health officials are encouraging gay, bisexual and other men who have sex with men to be vaccinated.

clusters.title: Bird flu confirmed at commercial poultry premises
clusters.neutral_headline: Bird flu confirmed at commercial poultry premises

items.title: Bird flu confirmed at commercial poultry premises
items.standfirst: Defra says a 3km (1.9 mile) protection zone is in place and all birds at the site will be culled.
items.content: Defra says a 3km (1.9 mile) protection zone is in place and all birds at the site will be culled.

clusters.title: NHS needs £3bn to cover strikes, redundancies and drug costs, say health leaders
clusters.neutral_headline: NHS needs £3bn to cover strikes, redundancies and drug costs, say health leaders

items.title: NHS needs £3bn to cover strikes, redundancies and drug costs, say health leaders
items.standfirst: Health leaders say progress on reducing waiting lists will be affected if there is no help in making up the financial shortfall.
items.content: Health leaders say progress on reducing waiting lists will be affected if there is no help in making up the financial shortfall.

clusters.title: The striking Swedish workers taking on carmaker Tesla
clusters.neutral_headline: The striking Swedish workers taking on carmaker Tesla

items.title: The striking Swedish workers taking on carmaker Tesla
items.standfirst: The industrial action against the company's operation in Sweden has reached its second anniversary.
items.content: The industrial action against the company's operation in Sweden has reached its second anniversary.

clusters.title: We will not 'be held to ransom' by striking doctors, says minister
clusters.neutral_headline: We will not 'be held to ransom' by striking doctors, says minister
bullet_summary: The health secretary is refusing to make concessions on pay after the BMA announced a further walkout

items.title: We will not 'be held to ransom' by striking doctors, says minister

items.content: The health secretary is refusing to make concessions on pay after the BMA announced a further walkout.
